00071 class story
00072     {
00073     private:
00074 
00075         story* next_story_node;
00076         story* first_daughter_node;
00077         story* last_daughter_node;
00078         char* text;
00079         int  chapter_flag;   // 0: this story is a line text
00080                              // 1: this story is a chapter
00081 
00082     public:
00083 
00085 
00088 
00089         story(int flag = 0)  // default: a bare story, to hold a text line only
00090             {
00091             next_story_node = first_daughter_node = last_daughter_node = NULL;
00092             text = NULL;
00093             chapter_flag = flag;
00094             }
00095 
00096         ~story();

00132         void set_text(char * a_string)
00133             {
00134             if(text != NULL)
00135                 delete [] text;
00136             text = new char[strlen(a_string)+1];
00137             strcpy(text, a_string);               // Note that a_string
00138                                                   // isn't deleted here.
00139             }
